title: 40% land shall be kept open for basic use with proper maneuvering buses / vehicle and remaining upto 60% land may be allow to be developed for affordable housing
clause_text: 40% land shall be kept open for basic use with proper maneuvering buses / vehicle and remaining upto 60% land may be allow to be developed for affordable housing. Such plot shall be owned by planning authority or development authority. Such composite use shall be segregated by separate entry / exit.
section: Composite development of Bus Terminal / Bus Depot / Truck Terminal for cities having population of 5 lacs and above â€“
